Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Yale
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th. 

Allow extra travel time. 

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 119th between Wentworth and Yale.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier fire department activity near Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier fire department activity near Grand.

Shuttle buses are available between Belmont to Racine  to provide connecting service through the affected area.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
